metadata.title: USN-7220-1 -- Vim vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Vim incorrectly handled memory when closing buffers with the visual mode active. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7220-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  vim - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 vim-athena - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 vim-common - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 vim-doc - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 vim-gtk3 - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 vim-gui-common - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 vim-motif - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 vim-nox - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 vim-runtime - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 vim-tiny - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 xxd - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.3 No subscription required
